details: Create a `useVoiceCommands` hook and UI overlay that uses the Web Speech API to replicate the Android app's voice control (Add emoji, Remove emoji, Clear, etc.). Support English and French.
Create a `PatternPrinter` utility using `jspdf` to generate A4 PDFs with the pattern centered, AI-generated name, and footer, matching the Android app's print layout.
Check `src/lib/constants/palettes.ts` (or equivalent) against the Android app's `PaletteManager` to ensure all 23 curated themes are present.
Implement `saveToLocalStorage` (with debouncing), `restoreFromLocalStorage`, and helper functions in `src/store/patternStore.ts`. Ensure pattern state is persisted locally for anonymous users.
Add `setActivePatternId` and `loadActivePattern` actions to `patternStore` to manage which pattern is currently being edited.
Implement `migrateAnonymousPatternToServer` action to sync local patterns when a user signs in, including Toast notifications for feedback.
Update `src/app/page.tsx` to utilize the new persistence actions, ensuring patterns are automatically saved and restored on page load.
